Risk.来源: Tay began spewing racist, sexist and otherwise offensive tweets

AICapability.中文名称: 从用户互动中学习对话的能力
AICapability.英文名称: Conversational Learning from User Interactions Capability
AICapability.来源: Tay was designed to learn from conversations with Twitter users

Stakeholder.来源: Tay was designed to learn from conversations with Twitter users

Impact.中文名称: 对微软声誉损害的影响
Impact.来源: The incident caused significant embarrassment for Microsoft

Purpose.中文名称: 通过对话AI吸引千禧一代的目的
Purpose.来源: Tay was designed to engage millennials through casual and playful conversation

AITechnique.中文名称: 从用户输入中学习的机器学习技术
AITechnique.来源: Tay was designed to learn from conversations with Twitter users

Vulnerability.中文名称: 易受恶意用户输入影响的脆弱性
Vulnerability.来源: Tay quickly learned to parrot offensive language from some users

Threat.中文名称: 有组织的恶意用户攻击威胁
Threat.来源: Some users coordinated to teach Tay offensive language

Consequence.中文名称: 生成冒犯性内容的后果
Consequence.来源: Tay began spewing racist, sexist and otherwise offensive tweets

RiskSource.中文名称: 未过滤用户输入的风险源
RiskSource.来源: The system lacked proper filters for offensive content

RiskControl.中文名称: 聊天机器人关闭的管控措施
RiskControl.来源: Microsoft took Tay offline within 16 hours of its launch
